title: Tobasco Donkeys - Free Songs
description:
These are 6 free songs offered by the Tobasco Donkeys for download from their websties. I've downloaded them and collected them in one place. Maybe this will spread word of their music to others who haven't heard of them.

If you like what you hear, check out their website or maybe even buy one of their albums at http://www.tobascodonkeys.com/ 





Track Listing:


1.    GOT MY MOJO WORKINÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢:   After a long day of recording at around 2am we were kicking around chatting about Philmont (of course).  Mike had a guitar he was doodling with.  Voss had a harmonica.  I moved the microphones to where they were sitting asked them to record something.  This is what came out. -Larry                                            
  Voss: Vocals, Harp Mike: Guitar


2.    JOHNNY 99:  We really wanted to put this one on the album because itÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s a great story song and itÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s from the same Bruce Springsteen album (Nebraska) as ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã…â€œReason To BelieveÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚ï¿½.  In the end, we figured the content didn't really fit the rest of the album.  A great song.  
100% Voss.  
- Larry


3.  LONG BLACK VEIL: This song should have been on the album but we felt we couldnÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢t get the right sound. 
 - Larry                                                                        Andy: Vocals & Guitar, Ellie: Fiddle, Mike: Bass


4.    CLUCK OLÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢ HEN: This was the first song we played for this session to test out the mikes.  We didn't get the best sound, but I LOVE what Iron John brings to this song.  Old-time fiddle and I really like his singing style. 
- Larry

Iron John: Vocals & Fiddle,

Andy: Guitar, Mike: Banjo, Tim: Mandolin


5.    CATS IN THE CRADLE: I used to play this along with my staff at campfires.  It had a lot of impact on the advisors.  But more so itÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s a song about regret.  Time wasted.  Sometimes people might regret time wasted at Philmont.  We just didn't need another ballad on the CD, especially one with me singing- and besides itÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s been done so well by so many people already.  - Larry

Larry: Vocals, Mike: Guitar, Andy: Bass


6.  land of the navajo - tobasco donkeys.mp3  A great story song and Andy played this for several years while he was out there.  We just couldn't find the right sound.   - Larry

Andy: Vocals & Guitar, Ellie: Fiddle, Tim: Mandolin, Mike: Bass
